description: Try our easy to follow Miso Roast Pumpkin and Polenta Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Miso Roast Pumpkin and Polenta Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750g pumpkin, peeled, deseeded, cut into 1.5cm cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Whisk miso, oil, honey and chilli flakes together in a large bowl. Toss pumpkin in miso mixture to coat.
Transfer pumpkin to prepared tray. Roast for 20 minutes or until golden and tender.

Meanwhile, line a 18x28cm slice pan with baking paper. Pour stock and milk into a saucepan and bring to the boil over high heat. Gradually whisk in polenta. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring constantly, until thick. Remove from heat and stir in butter and parmesan. Season with pepper.
Pour mixture into slice pan and smooth surface. Scatter with sesame seeds. Press pumpkin into surface. Chill for 30 minutes or until firm. Cut into pieces and top with chives and chilli to serve.
